directions: Cook and stir chorizo sausage in a skillet over medium heat until cooked completely, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and transfer to a slow cooker.
Stir diced tomatoes, cream cheese, and processed cheese in with the chorizo.
Cook on Low until cheese is melted, stirring occasionally, 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TEL®), drained
1 (8 ounce) package processed cheese (such as Velveeta®), cubed
title: Chorizo Queso Dip
